response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. This product is valued at $15,000 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. I understand the value of this product might be perceived differently by you, but I am confident it will provide substantial benefits. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 14000}
